mapper.insert: inser into addresses (id, house_number, street_id, city_id, state, zip_code_id, longitude, latitude, landmark_name) values (#{id}, #{houseNumber}, #{streetId}, #{cityId}, #{stateName}, #{zipCodeId}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{landmarkName})
mapper.select: select a.id, a.house_number, a.street_id, s.name as street_name, a.city_id, c.name as city_name, a.state_name, a.zip_code_id, z.code as zip_code, a.longitude, a.latitude, a.landmark_name from addresses a join streets s on a.street_id = s.id join cities c on a.city_id = c.id join zip_codes z on a.zip_code_id = z.id where a.id = #{id}
